title: (13300) Valdepeñas - 66 Avenida de los Estudiantes

description: Quiet Good for a night near a park.

title: (13300) Valdepeñas - 5 Calle Guardia Civil
description: Safe parking, next to a typical windmill of La Mancha (Museum), you can walk to the main square, try chocolate with churros (Veracruz). And buy regional products, economic gas station (Hiper simple) 700 mts away and super Lidl. Wine festival 1 week in September.

title: (13300) Valdepeñas - 1C Calle Pellejo
description: Motorhome area in Valdepeñas, quiet to sleep

title: (13300) Valdepeñas - 28 Calle Bodegas Morenito
description: Laundry service at the Alcampo.

title: (13300) Valdepeñas - 388 Calle Viña Lola
description: On a large area of ​​interrupted real estate project, many parking along sidewalks with public lighting and quiet. Nearby: hypermarket cafeteria ...

title: (13300) Valdepeñas - 69 Avenida Vino
description: A large flat parking lot and super-super simply Lidl (good diesel price) Ideal for visiting Valdepeñas - Near a museum and good wines.

title: (13300) Valdepeñas - 56 Calle Bodegas Morenito
description: Parking bays on a street in a new development area. Good for one night. Lidl/Decathlon are within walking distance.

title: (13300) Valdepeñas -
description: It is a paved parking area in a viewpoint at the foot of the Angel (a monument)

title: (13300) Valdepeñas - Paseo del Cementerio
description: Cemetery parking lot. Quiet, view of the countryside.

title: (13300) El Peral - CR-6441
description: A little hill with enough space to park a few medium sized vans. At the time of writing this only one other small car was parked here. beautiful view, very quiet and peaceful. no prohibition signs, no amenities. supposedly open 24h. spend one night without any problems. you can hear the highway in the distance. no shade

title: (13300) Valdepenas - 193 Carretera Madrid Cadiz Km
description: Air on the motorway with a pay terminal for water

title: (13300) El Peral - 15D Vía Baños Peral 15
description: A stop on the shady path or for a quiet night. Wooded area with restaurant and bar. Municipal parking on arrival but the shade is next to the restroom building.

title: (13300) Valdepeñas - Carril de las Carretas
description: Parking for the night next to the gas station, with access to the highway.

title: (13730) Santa Cruz de Mudela - 210 A-4
description: It is called La Pará Rociera, it is a gas station where you can fill water with a short hose, a store and restaurant with good prices and large sandwiches ... some shady tree to eat and rest in the cool

title: (13300) - 211 A-4
description: Parking area managed by the General Directorate of Traffic, with a direct exit from the motorway heading south. It has many parking spaces for vehicles but more adjusted for motorhomes. It has several bathrooms with showers, picnic tables, filling and emptying of sewage as it has a treatment plant. At the entrance there is an information office. Place of prayer for Muslims. It is only open in summer to cross the strait, a pity that it is not open all year.

title: (13300) Valdepeñas - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place to sleep with a view and silence. Walking route 'routa de Don Quijote' around the corner. At 500m from the public road, but very well accessible dirt road.

title: (13310) Valdepeñas - CRP-5214
description: Esplanade with gas station and restaurant bar. The bar is open all night. Many trucks spend the night. In the restaurant we dined very well and the attention was excellent. Being glued to the highway early in the morning you could hear the traffic.

title: (13300) Valdepeñas - Unnamed Road
description: Beside the lake with a view towards the hills opposite, peaceful. No camping prohibition signs, sign that prohibits swimming and fishing, there's a kayak centre not far from here. Lovely walks, used by the locals, lots of toilet paper about but I cleaned it all so nature restored. No services, bin close by.  Follow the paved road to the dam wall, the access road is on the left before the dam wall it is a single narrow dirt track for about 100m with a few overhanging trees but we made it in our 7m long, 3m high camper

title: (13310) Consolación -
description: Fantastic winery to visit in Consuegra. Live the history of tradition and enjoy the experiences in a winery of yesteryear. We will be open on weekends and holidays and that it is necessary to make a reservation in advance to make the visit.

title: (13390) Pozo de la Serna - 1 Carretera Infantes P
title_short: (13390) Pozo de la Serna - 1 Carretera Infantes P
description: Large parking in a small, quiet village with a beautiful view of nature. In an area where parking spaces are scarce it is welcome.

title: (13326) Montiel -
description: Quiet and relaxing place in the countryside near the lake. Not overlooked, ideal for lovers of wildlife. Some stable places, otherwise provide holds. gravel / dirt road accessible to all vehicles just after trees coming from Valdepenas!

title: (13730) Santa Cruz de Mudela - 12 Paseo Castelar
title_short: (13730) Santa Cruz de Mudela - 12 Paseo Castelar

title: (13247) San Carlos del Valle -
description: Picnic place to rest and possibility to spend the night. Wonderful views during the day, but especially at night towards the illuminated church. There is not a lot of parking space and it is slightly incline, but it is always empty and very quiet. There are picnic tables and trash cans.

title: (13247) San Carlos del Valle - 11 CR-644
description: Place away from the town of San Carlos del Valle next to the hermitage of San Isidro, a very very quiet place to spend the night. surrounded by a pine forest to walk. There is water inside the enclosure with a tap, next to the barbecues.

title: (13247) San Carlos del Valle - 86 Avenida del Azuer
title_short: (13247) San Carlos del Valle - 86 Avenida del Azuer

title: (13247) San Carlos del Valle - 9 Camino Altillo

title_short: (13350) Moral de Calatrava - 110 Avenida Capitán Camilo Labrador Sáez
description: Nice esplanade to spend a night, some noise from being now in the vintage of the tractors but bearable, the center of the town 5 minutes, super and pharmacy nearby, gas station next door, what was said for a stop on the road or a visit it's okay

title: (13247) San Carlos del Valle - 5 Camino Senda Galvarin
title_short: (13247) San Carlos del Valle - 5 Camino Senda Galvarin

title: (13247) San Carlos del Valle - 28 Calle Colón

description: Small motorway area with shop, gas station, toilets, restaurant and ... showers!

title: (13738) Santa Cruz de Mudela - 1 CR-6102
description: Picturesque luxury parking space, very close to the highway.

title: (13738) Santa Cruz de Mudela - 62 Poblado Nuestra Señora de las Vir
title_short: (13738) Santa Cruz de Mudela - 62 Poblado Nuestra Señora de las Vir
description: Large quiet gravel parking lot in Las Virtudes. Picnic area in a shaded corner. Great countryside views. A few steps from the 17th century bullring. Attached to the 15th century church. Toilets in front of the arenas. Also not far from Bodegas Cañaveras in Santa Cruz de Mudela - a beautiful family winery that still uses giant original clay pots. Worth a visit. After the park next to the bullring there is a source of drinking water. While there is no sign, the gentleman from the arena told us so and we saw locals getting their water supply there.

address.street: 62 Poblado Nuestra Señora de las Vir

title: (13230) Membrilla - A-4, Km. 178
description: A tap with drinking water on the right after the restaurant and service station. left to the toilets

title_short: (13730) Santa Cruz de Mudela - 223 Autovía del Sur
description: Gas station with shower service

title: (13230) Membrilla - 33 Calle Paseos del Espino
description: Car park El Espino. Ample parking for vehicles up to 6m. Ideal to spend the day or rest one night.

title: (13240) La Solana - 5 Avenida de la Paz
title_short: (13240) La Solana - 5 Avenida de la Paz
description: La Solana motorhome area, area with very spacious pitches, well leveled and with shaded areas. It has all the services, including bathrooms with showers. Of course, there is a charge for the zone and each service is chargeable apart from the night service. Located in a park, 10 minutes walk from the center. Perfect to spend a night, discover the city, buy La Mancha products. Good area near (30 km) from the natural park of Las Lagunas de Ruidera.

title: (13260) Bolaños de Calatrava - 16 Urbanización Virgen del Monte Xxxv
title_short: (13260) Bolaños de Calatrava - 16 Urbanización Virgen del Monte Xxxv
description: Very level dirt parking lot between two hermitages / sanctuaries from where a couple of hiking trails start. We have only made it through the day, although there was no sign of not staying overnight.

title: (13248) Alhambra - Unnamed Road

title: (13240) La Solana - 29 Calle Soledad
description: Automatic laundry with many washing machines including machines for washing pet accessories, it has free wifi, change machine, coffee machine and spreader.

name: Gasolinera Repsol
title: (13200) Gasolinera Repsol
description: Parking in a large secure lot behind Repsol Service Station, ask at the counter for black/grey waste, the assistant, opens the drain cover, no English spoken,

Only for a van or Camper since the parking lots are on battery if an AC is installed it would come out a lot from the back, we were sleeping on Friday, July 21, 2023 and we were great, there is lighting, a lot of shade and a quiet place to spend the night.

Laundry in the center of town, with a van it is easy to park on the same street, with AC perhaps more complicated, but surely there is somewhere nearby.
Open 365 days from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: (13200) Manzanares - 38 Carretera de Madrid

title: (13200) Manzanares - 21 Calle Olimpia

It is next to a small police station, I understand that a little more noise was heard during the week. Local Police very close and the town. The place doesn't have any charm, but it's fine to sleep when you're passing through. no services

title: (13260) Bolaños de Calatrava - 30 Calle Manzanares
description: New laundry, right next door there is also a supermarket. XXL washers and dryers.

title: (13360) Granátula de Calatrava - Cam. de la Aldea del Rey
title_short: (13360) Granátula de Calatrava - Cam. de la Aldea del Rey
description: Very quiet car park day/night. Gravel and asphalt leveling. To sleep you don't hear anything except the sound of nature. Next to an archaeological site of good cultural tourist interest and a Roman bridge (Publio baebio). It has a playground, picnic areas and garbage containers. The town is 4 km away and has all the services (pharmacies, bakeries, bars, tobacconists, grocery stores, banks). The environment is surrounded by olive and almond trees.

address.street: Cam. de la Aldea del Rey

title: (13260) Bolaños de Calatrava - CM-4107

title: (13750) Castellar de Santiago - 48 Calle Bailén

name: Camping Los Arenales Almagro
title: (13270) Camping Los Arenales Almagro
description: Well located very shady place with big trees. The place has a lot of potential which unfortunately is not used. Sanitary okay, plots partly dirty and neglected. Cafeteria permanently closed, restaurants closed (Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday...). Nice pool with bar (bar very expensive). Bread service was offered but didn't take place the next morning. In this condition, the place is only suitable for transit as a self-catering.

title: (13270) Almagro - 47 Calle Ejido de San Juan
title_short: (13270) Almagro - 47 Calle Ejido de San Juan

title: (13270) Almagro - 2 Calle David Rayo

title: (13270) Almagro - 0 Calle Chile

title: (13345) Cózar - 118D Calle Santa Ana
description: Sports area of the city, 100% asphalt, municipal swimming pool, paddle tennis court, covered pavilion, shower, toilet and bar service in summer.

title: (13760) Almuradiel -

title: (13760) Almuradiel - Camino al Pantano de Almuradiel
title_short: (13760) Almuradiel - Camino al Pantano de Almuradiel
description: Nice pitch with kids. Sit around the back seat around a fence. They can't leave. There are picnic benches/tables, there are 10 BBQ's with shade, there is water. Toilet drain not recognized / clogged. Quiet at night and during the day, except for a single noisy train right next to it behind the fence.

title: (13344) Torre de Juan Abad - CR-P-6142
description: Parking to a chapel 4 km from the city. Quiet and without problems. Very beautiful fountain with water tower of Juan Abad is the cradle of Quevedo. It's worth walking on its streets

title: (13370) Calzada de Calatrava - 166 Calle Cervantes
description: Parking in the street, without problems, in front of one of the most beautiful painted silos of the Titanes project. Quiet place, although on business days it can be a bit noisy because there is a school in front.

title: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - 3 Plaza San Sebastián
title_short: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - 3 Plaza San Sebastián

title: (13248) Alhambra - 37 Grupo San Bartolomé A
description: We spent the night, quiet, and safely. a castle in ruins is easily accessible, ideal for getting there before continuing the road.

title: (13370) Aldea del Rey - Unnamed Road
description: Small car park located behind the dam of the Jabalón Reservoir. Level asphalt floor. It does not have a garbage deposit but it exists at the deviation of the access road 2.0 km.

title: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - 1 Plaza Fuente Vieja
title_short: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - 1 Plaza Fuente Vieja
description:
Quiet location, close to houses and a church. 
Large square. 
From 12 to 16 October day of the courtyards.

title: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes -
description: On the car park of the sanctuary of the Virgin of Antigua. Quiet area with lots of picnic area and playground for kids. Night without problems. Without services and 4.5 km from Villanueva de los Infantes. Paved road but a little narrow

title: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - 4 Plaza Junta de Comunidades
title_short: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - 4 Plaza Junta de Comunidades
description: Parking without services next to the hermitage of San Miguel. Flat and with room for 10-12 AC. quiet place

title: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - 22 Calle Miguel de Unamuno
title_short: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - 22 Calle Miguel de Unamuno
description: It's a nice area for motorhomes, super deluxe. Still a few things to improve. There are no rubbish bins, a cistern for the toilets and a water connection to be filled by hose. The project is financed with European money!

title: (13770) Viso del Marqués -
description: Place in the middle of nature, with the option of fishing or taking a walk in the area. Flat terrain just before crossing the dam, where the fishermen park. Our van is small and we crossed the dam that there is another esplanade and the dust from the road where you arrive does not reach you because the odd vehicle passes by during the day. At night one last.

title: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - Calle Miguel de Unamuno
title_short: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - Calle Miguel de Unamuno
description: Picnic area without service. I don't think there is a problem for the night because there was no ban.

title: (13329) Carrizosa -
description: Hermitage of the Virgen del Salido. It has a large area with trees to park as well as a cemented area where the garbage is that is also enabled as parking. The flat terrain. Ideal in summer because there is shade under the trees but also in winter in the cemented part that gets more sun. There are public toilets but they were closed, behind them a water point (we do not know if it is drinking water). There are also rubbish bins.

title: (13770) Viso del Marqués - Camino de las Alcobillas
title_short: (13770) Viso del Marqués - Camino de las Alcobillas
description: Picnic area in a pine forest. Barbecues year round. Very difficult access for motorhomes due to the inclination and the narrowness of the road. Swimming pool, restaurant and caterer.

title: (13250) Daimiel - 13 Calle Pontevedra
description: Daimiel. near the center, a few km. natural park of Las Tablas de Daimiel and Motilla de Azuer. Quiet. close gas station, restaurant, workshop, supermarkets

title: (13380) Aldea del Rey - 11 Calle Nueva Apertura E
title_short: (13380) Aldea del Rey - 11 Calle Nueva Apertura E
description: Inaugurated in June 2021. Automated access and service contract (electricity, water change and showers/WC) and payment for each one separately. It only accepts credit card payment. Beautiful surroundings, the shade growing and the pleasant town. Maximum stay 48 hours

title: (13250) Daimiel - 30 Paseo Carmen
description: Station service in Daimiel signposted by Cepsa where motorhomes are welcome. It has a car park, black and gray water drainage areas, and drinking water filling. Sale of butane and propane, firewood and biomass. It has a free shower for guests and a cafeteria. Very clean bathrooms with breastfeeding area. Shop with local products. The owner has another low cost gas station next to this one with great fuel discounts and a wash area. You can park and sleep without problem in one of its esplanades.

title: (13220) Llanos del Caudillo - 14 Poblado Llanos Caudillo
title_short: (13220) Llanos del Caudillo - 14 Poblado Llanos Caudillo
description: Well leveled paved streets in an area without buildings, calm and quiet to rest or spend the night.

title: () - N-310
description: Old service area, with the gas station closed. very wide and lonely. some truck spends the night.

title: (13768) Almuradiel - Autovía del Sur
description: Quiet picnic area for a rest stop and eat, I don't think you can spend the night because it is a protected park. We have found the barbecues closed, of course because it is a fire season. When we were eating, the Civil Guard passed.

title: (23215) Aldeaquemada - 37 Avenida de Andalucia
description: Parking next to the village square of the village quemada no service

title: (13380) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the castle of Calatrava. ATTENTION: Only from the afternoon of Sunday to Tuesday morning, since the castle closes on Monday.The rest of the days are usually full during the day, although late in the afternoon any day is good. The views are simply spectacular. Without any service except the bin.

title: (13160) - 20 Avenida Campo de Calatrava
description: However, this location is well signposted for the village. The panel looks very neat and the amenities are there as they should be. Fill in water, discharge waste water and electricity is switched off, washing dishes everything is possible! beautiful concrete slab with enough space!

title: (13250) Daimiel - Unnamed Road
description: Parking on the edge of the Navaseca lagoon, without service. There is no prohibition sign. Tour to the lagoon of 3 km on foot, with observatories and many birds to see. Quiet and friendly.

title: (23213) Santa Elena - N-IVa
description: Nice place to go hiking, visit cave of cave paintings and visit the Despeñaperros Natural Park. It has a source of drinking water and a garbage container. I recommend buying partridge pâté at the restaurant, which is very good apart from other things. Just say we leave this place better than we have found it.

title: (23213) - N-IVa
description: Off the main on a disused road. Access a little bumpy but OK for my Citroen Relay campervan, even tho i have low water-tanks underside.

title: (23215) Aldeaquemada - J-6110
description: Small clearing at the top, a couple of kilometers from the Cimbarra waterfall.

title: (23215) Aldeaquemada - J-6110
description: Very quiet corner. departure of hike / walk waterfall of cimbarra. preferable van. dirt road on 2 km.

title: (23213) Santa Elena - N-IVa
description: Viewpoint of the Organs. Parking next to the viewpoint, perfect for a break and eating with a view.

title: (23213) Santa Elena - N-IVa
description: This is a ok place to stop and sleep, close to nature and a small road.

title: (23213) Santa Elena - N-IVa
description: Roadside rest stop - sort of flat. Suitable for an overnight stop but not setting up for a while. Quiet road but near main freeway so there is some traffic noise. You are well off the road. Has small bin and bench seat. Can easily fit more vehicles if parked well or travelling together and ok blocking each other in (4-6).  Near to national park. No street lights. There are a number of pull overs on the road that may also be suitable overnight stops.

title: (13710) Argamasilla de Alba -
description: A small place between fields directly on a small river. Nice and shady under the trees, but only recommended for small campers and not for mobile homes.

title: (13710) Argamasilla de Alba - 20 CM-3115
description: Municipal RV park under the pines, next to the free campsite and picnic area. Ideal for stays of up to two nights, which is the maximum. It is located in front of the country promenades in front of the Castle of Peñarroya, which are the other places indicated. The environment is nice, with cafeteria - shop and small old one. Playground.

title: (13710) Argamasilla de Alba - 21 CM-3115
description: Very quiet, on the lake, no services but beautiful site. Natural park, prohibited night.

title: (13710) Argamasilla de Alba - 21 CM-3115
description: Large esplanade next to the Peñarroya Castle (12th century). Area in front of the castle and the Peñarroya reservoir, next to a hermitage. You can stay overnight for up to 48 hours and it is a place with beautiful trees and lawns, quiet, although it is near a road without much traffic.

title: (23213) Santa Elena - N-IVa
description: It is a very quiet place to spend the night. It is close to the highway and you can hear cars far in the distance, but it doesn't bother you, you sleep great. In addition, there is good shade to shelter from the sun so it is cool. There is a concrete table with picnic seats.

title: (13250) Daimiel - Unnamed Road
description: Parking area in the natural park of Daimiel. Green Zone. Possibility of walks and bike. Ask permission to park information or the guardian. Free. No service available. Toilets in the House of the Park during opening hours.

title: (23213) Santa Elena - N-IVa
description: Halt on the old Despeñaperros road. With a shade to rest or spend the night. No more. The terrain may be somewhat sloping, but it is quiet

title_short: (13710) Argamasilla de Alba - 2 Camino de Parraguilla

title_short: (23213) Santa Elena - Camino del Barranco del Lobo

title_short: (13710) Área de servicio de autocaravanas Argamasilla de Alba

Information and reservation: number available to PRO subscribers.

description: CAMPING DESPEÑAPERROS. Big camping. Good start for Despeñaperros national park and Cimbarra waterfalls.

title: (13710) Argamasilla de Alba - 5 Carretera la Solana-Tomelloso
title_short: (13710) Argamasilla de Alba - 5 Carretera la Solana-Tomelloso
description: Automated parking area. Access with gate and possibility to use electricity, water loading / unloading, toilet and shower (all for a fee via the control panel outside. It took us about 20 minutes to understand how registration works to access the area. a document (Italian identity card is fine) and then enter all the data including the vehicle license plate. The camera will recognize the license plate and open the gate. For the pedestrian gate instead there is a code on the receipt ticket (not lose it) to access the area.

description: At the time, I slept in the school area, but today, walking in the city, I saw an Italian stationed in the town square, and after consulting the local police, I I am here. Glory, as in the old days. There is wifi from the town hall.

title: (23213) Santa Elena - J-6120

title: (23213) Santa Elena - Autovía del Sur
